programs.programName: Master of Science in Computer Science
eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field with a minimum GPA of 3.0.
Proficiency in at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C++).
requiredDocuments: Official transcripts from all previous institutions

programs.programName: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
eligibilityCriteria: Minimum GPA of 2.5 in high school.
